name: BADGES
desc:
These are wearable badges that suit your outfit.

This airplane badge is a great gift for your friends or loved one.

AvionWear also have a large range of airline-specific pin badges which will delight the aircraft enthusiast in your life.

name: MAGNETS
desc:
These are fridge magnets which kindle the creativity of your home.

Fridge magnets are a great way to put up reminders and decorate your refrigerator.

AvionWear offers a great collection of fridge magnets to suit your style and decor.
